Fiscal year runs from July to June. Ratios as share of GDP are impacted by GDP rebasing, which took place between the 1st and 2nd Reviews.

At the time of the 2nd review, it included bond issuance for debt management operations (incl. early rollover of the Eurobond maturing in 2024), which remains under active consideration but is no longer in the baseline.
